author: Steve C
comment: Great for simple, free book reader on watch.  No issues downloading txt books from Gutenberg and transferring to watch, using the reader app on the phone itself.  Switching pages is a little clunky as you need to scroll for awhile to you get the end of an automatically created "page", then when you can't scroll further, long press the screen.  But this is all I wanted for times when I'm bored and can't really pull my phone out for one reason or another.

author: Владислав Глаголев
comment: Thus app saved me on the exam. A small Python script to align answers by 10KB and the extremely quick and invisible access to 50 answers is ready! When I realized Google Keep does not load many big notes, I was sad, but this app is absolutely great!
title: Great thanks!!!

author: Kapil Kumar
comment: I've been having a great time reading books with this. It would be even better if there were shortcuts for scrolling down with taps at the top/bottom or left/right like you have in traditional reading apps for advancing pages.
title: Great functional ebook reader for watches

comment: 7/1 It would be perfect if this app could allow for multiple articles to be saved and accessed via an article list on the Wear app. Is that possible? -- 7/14 Thanks for the update!!! 5 stars!

reply.author: Marcel Dopita
reply.content: It is now possible to store and switch between multiple files in the latest version.

author: Tyler D
comment: App that does what it says. Easy to read and i like the black background with white text. Would be 4-5 starts if you could make it to where you could change page without speaking, like in the PDF reader app. Also if it would scroll much faster. Takes forever to get from one page to the next scrolling.
title: Simple, works.
